name: Ted's Music Store
description: Ted's Music Store has a collection of different songs in CD format. Usually found are Rock style of music from 80-Today.

name: Vintage Vinyls
description: Vintage Vinyls has a range of classic songs & modern songs that are available in vinyl for avid collectors to buy.

name: Music Inc
description: Music Inc offers both CD, Vinyl and even Cassette Tape format for a range of songs and genres.
